廥字的基本解释

廥
kuài
存放草料的房舍：“时右校刍廥在寺北垣下。”
储存的草料：“储廥廪。”
仓；仓库：仓廥。

廥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuài］
［《廣韻》古外切，去泰，見。］
(1)堆放秣草的房舍。
(2)粮仓。
(3)储存；聚集。

廥字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廥； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页351第11
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?古外切，音儈。【說文】芻藳之藏。【急就篇】墼壘廥廐庫東廂。【註】廥，芻藳所居也。　又廥積，星名。【史記·天官書】胃爲天倉，其南衆星曰廥積。【隋書·天文志】天廩四星在昴南。一曰天廥，主畜黍稷以供享祀。

廥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
廥字的起名意思

暂无。

廥
Basic explanation of words
廥
kuài
The house where the forage is stored: "Shiyou school is under the north wall of the temple."
Stored fodder: "Chu 廥廪."
Warehouse; warehouse: warehouse.
廥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuài］
["Guangyun" ancient outside cut, go to Thailand, see you. ]
(1) Houses stacked with grass.
(2) Granary.
(3) Storage; gathering.
廥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　廥; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 351 to 11
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Ancient outside cut, phonics. 【Said the text】The Tibetan of Humiao. [Jijiu articles] The east wing of Yilixianku. 【Note】Xiao, the place where Chuhuo lives.　Finally, star name. 【Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials】The stomach is Tiancang, and the southern stars say lingering accumulation. [Sui Shu·Astronomy] The four stars of Tianlin are in Subaru. On the first day, Tianxu, the main animal and millet are used for the sacrifice.
